page.title: 08Industry
page.content:
There are a few small scale industrial businesses, most of them concentrated in two new developments near Whitehill on the B4230 to Weobley. The sites were built by English Industrial Estates in association with the Council for Small Industries in Rural Areas.
The Kington Rd site contains Neatwood (13 staff), Primasil (12 staff) and a fork lift repair shop.
The second site at Whitehill contains small, locally owned units dealing in electronics and dairy produce.
In addition to the above, there is a family agricultural business at Lower Hurst.
